select * from t_user t
t.user_name = #{userName} and t.password = #{password}

select t1.user_id, t1.user_name, t1.password, t1.profile_picture, t1.name, t1.sex, t1.birthday, t1.address, t1.email, t1.department, t1.introduction, t1.enabled, t1.create_time, t1.modify_time, IF(count(distinct t2.record_id) > 0, 1, 0) as locked from t_user t1 left join t_user_locked_record t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id and t2.unlocked_time > now() group by t1.user_id, t1.user_name, t1.password, t1.profile_picture, t1.name, t1.sex, t1.birthday, t1.address, t1.email, t1.department, t1.introduction, t1.enabled, t1.create_time, t1.modify_time

SELECT t3.role_id, t3.role_name, t3.description, t3.remark, t3.create_time, t3.modify_time FROM t_user t1 LEFT JOIN t_user_role t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.role_id
t1.user_name = #{userName} and t3.role_id IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_locked_record ( record_id, user_id, locked_time, unlocked_time )VALUES ( UUID(), #{userId}, #{lockedTime}, #{unlockedTime} )
